title: raamaa ravikulasOmaa
sahitya:
rAmA ravikulasOmA tArakanAmA vara bhAmAmaNi sItAsamEta

anupallavi
 
kAmArikk-ati prEmA mA parandAmA tA mAmadhuram taru guruguha gItAmudam

caraNam
 
sharaNam raghurAmA andakkaraNam tanil abhirAma nin nAma smaraNam tandu
janana maraNam aravE vitaraNa kavi kunjaradAsan enakkaruL shrI
